mapper.select: select MAX(IF(info.statType = '0401', info.statNum, 0)) as playStatNum, MAX(IF(info.statType = '0402', info.statNum, 0)) as subscribeStatNum, MAX(IF(info.statType = '0403', info.statNum, 0)) as buyStatNum, MAX(IF(info.statType = '0404', info.statNum, 0)) as commentStatNum from (select stat.album_id as albumId, stat.stat_type as statType, stat.stat_num as statNum from album_stat stat where album_id = #{albumId}) info group by info.albumId
